content.rendered:
Marketing

Cogency Global

Cogency Global offers a full range of statutory representation, compliance and corporate services, including nonprofit, UCC & IP due diligence in the U.S., as well as international document authentication, lien searches and registered agent services. We created & executed a comprehensive B2B marketing strategy for them.

B2B Marketing case study

Achieving B2B Growth

Cogency Global is a leading provider of statutory representation, compliance, and corporate services. They needed a comprehensive B2B marketing strategy that would increase their online presence and engage their target audience.

We work with Cogency to create weekly content for social media, run Google Ads campaigns, improve their site’s SEO fitness and so much more. The team at Cogency Global have been thrilled with the results and continue to work with us to further develop their online presence.

b2b marketing

Content Creation

We execute a weekly & monthly content strategy for Cogency Global, compromised of:

  • Blog posts
  • Social media graphics
  • Infographics
  • Videos
  • Email
  • Print assets

The content is used for both new customer acquisition
& lead nurturing.

Showcase

Here’s what we did

contact our team
